text: @BobHepburn @liberal_party @JustinTrudeau @TorontoStar Holy cow! Talk about hero worship and slamming conservatives. 🙄 The fact that his team has twisted criticism of Tam into racism speaks to this blackface-wearing twit's record as PM - and it is not new with Covid19. He's done what he should as PM but not the hero painted here. https://t.co/HFXmd9LKZ5
